description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. "I wanna play," says your toddler as you're trying to play your Xbox game.  So you give him a broken controller to trick him.  "Mine doesn't work," cries the kid.  "Ok, I will try to find a game for you. For only $1, Search and Seek-Toddler Style is that game.  Your kid can have fun searching for items in 4different levels, which also includes 5different musical choices to entertain them.
